Title: BP, Guangzhou Gas agree 12-year LNG term supply deal
Description: Guangzhou Gas has signed its first long-term LNG contract with BP, having procured LNG only on a spot basis since July 2019. The firm is developing a 1.1 million tonnes a year (mtpa) LNG receiving facility in Nansha, Guangzhou, to which the new term supply is expected to be delivered
Author: CK

Title: Petronet seeks one second-half July LNG cargo
Description: Indiaâ€™s state-owned Petronet has issued a tender to buy one cargo for delivery on July 19, 23, 24 or 26 to its 17.5 million tonnes a year (mtpa) Dahej receiving terminal In Gujarat.
Author: CK
